Embedded_text:
Bitcoin RBF is just opt-in flag on transaction, where sender indicates that it may do RBF. But there is nothing different in bcash vs Bitcoin that prevents double spending of 0-conf transactions. You can't build the trust on the behaviour of reference wallet instead of protocol.
